description: SOTA agents by task specialty. Each agent entry provides role, specialty tasks, suggested models, and a concise prompt scaffold.

agents.name: reasoning_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Use aggregated metrics and hard cases to propose accept/reject/review rules. Output JSON with decision rationale and key metrics referenced.

agents.name: alignment_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Check visual-text alignment risks. List alignment checks and scenarios requiring manual review. Return structured checklist.

agents.name: robustness_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: From hard cases, summarize risk patterns and propose defensive filters or review triggers. Output risk pattern + recommended checks.

agents.name: quality_filter_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Convert high-frequency general metrics (with specific examples) into concise filtering rules. Keep rules short and directly actionable.

agents.name: prompt_designer
agents.prompt_scaffold: Produce â‰¤8-line prompts for each agent with input placeholders and expected JSON output schema.

agents.name: consistency_auditor
agents.prompt_scaffold: Given high-variance samples, recommend re-check criteria and weighted strategies. Output review checklist.

agents.name: code_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Given code-related metrics or issues, propose fixes or verification steps. Return patch suggestions and test ideas.

agents.name: ocr_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Extract and verify text/layout consistency. Flag ambiguity and low-confidence regions. Output structured fields + confidence.

agents.name: geometry_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Solve or validate geometry/spatial tasks; ensure consistency of spatial relations. Provide step-by-step reasoning summary.

agents.name: math_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Perform step-by-step math reasoning; verify numeric answers; return final answer + justification.

agents.name: safety_bias_agent
agents.prompt_scaffold: Screen for safety/bias issues in samples; list risk categories and recommend mitigation or removal criteria.
